title: Boston Harbor Islands National Recreation Area: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       Management of the Boston Harbor Islands is coordinated by the Boston Harbor Islands Partnership, with staff at each Partnership agency. The National Park Service (NPS) supports the Partnership through park superintendent, Giles Parker.  Information about the NPS organization at Boston Harbor Islands can be found below.  By Mail Boston Harbor Islands National Park Service 15 State Street, Suite 1100 Boston, MA 02109-3502  By Phone or eMail Visitor Information 617-223-8666 email a ranger  Partnership Office 617-223-8667  By Fax 617-223-8671
